author: berkel
title: Nice to own
review:
I got this set from my father for my wedding.

He bougt it in Denmark at Billund.

It's great and special, I never used it, and it came already build.

Never the less I rebuild it with the white undersite now onder the black top and the other way round.

Now it's even better.

author: redgreenblue
title: Lego taking over the home
review:
I've had this set for a few years now after I was bought it as a Christmas present.  It's pretty cool to look at, but having actually used it the hole which the salt and pepper come out of get blocked easily and the white plastic is starting to turn yellow.

Also small children (toddlers) are easily able to remove the bottom and deposit salt all over your floor/laptop/coffee.
